517640.name: Cyber Chicken - OST
517640.description:
This is the award-winning soundtrack for Cyber Chicken, the next-next gen game from Groupees Interactive and WHOA!, featuring 40 epic tracks created exclusively for the game and spanning nearly 60 minutes of electronic music goodness - all composed & produced by Noam Guterman. All tracks are provided in both FLAC and 320kbps MP3 formats.

TRACK LIST

1. He's Buck - Main Theme (2:21)
2. Ground Zero (1:55)
3. It's a Government Terminator (1:19)
4. Welcome to JP Choice Bank (1:34)
5. Fight to the Debt (2:21)
6. Pit of Splinters (2:02)
7. Rats and Bats (1:44)
8. Bat Brothers (1:15)
9. Shredder's Avenue (2:10)
10. Let's Go MMA (1:25)
11. Abandoned Tunnels (1:43)
12. Ambush in the Gutters (1:31)
13. Liberty's Tomb (2:27)
14. I Met Tougher Girl Scouts (1:21)
15. The Statue (0:13)
16. New New Old Brooklyn (1:22)
17. Uppercut Jam (1:15)
18. Brooklyn Slums (1:20)
19. Red Jackets (1:37)
20. Roid Boy (1:36]
21. Outskirts of a Fallen City (2:56)
22. Jacked Up on Bigbucks (1:41)
23. Do You Know the Farmer (0:44)
24. An Opening (0:07)

BONUS Cyber Chicken Ringtones and Notifications!

NOTE: The tracks will be placed in your Cyber Chicken folder in the Steam Directory: ...\Steam\steamapps\common\CyberChicken\Original Soundtrack {MP3, FLAC}\
